SUBJECTIVE: COMPLAINT 1 Provider: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) MD Chief Complaint: ENDO/LIPID Subjective: 66 YR OLD WHITE MALE WITH HX OF HYPERTRIGLYCERIDEMIA X 5 YEARS ON VASCEPA FOR 1 YEAR. STATES TRIGL WAS 800 , NOW 434. STATES HE COULD NOT TOLERATE OTHER ANTI-TRIGLYCERIDE MEDS DUE TO THEIR GI SIDE EFFECTS. HX OF OBSTRUCTUVE SLEEP APNEA X 5 YEARS FOR WHICH HE USED A CPAP MACHINE. STATES HE HAD HIS CPAP MACHINE WITH HIM WHEN HE ARRESTED. STATES THE FBI LOCELY HAS L4 - L5 SEVERE STENOSIS CASUING NUMBBNESS AND SHOOTING PAIN IN THE LOWER EXTREMITIES.
